name: All My Movies Database File
summary: Learn about .AMM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: All My Movies retrieves information about movies by automatically downloading information from online databases.
NOTE: AMM files are saved in the .MDB (Microsoft Access) format.

description: File created by All My Movies, a personal movie organizer for Windows; saves a catalog of information about video files, DVDs, Blu-ray movies, and VHS tapes; used for keeping an inventory of a personal collection of movies.
